oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hand-Book of Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Agriculture; Mining; Emigration & immigration
Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hard-bound volume containing topographical, mineral, agricultural, economic, and social conditions about the state of Tennessee in order to promote immigration into the state.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: A. W. Hawkins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A. W. Hawkins was the Tennessee Commissioner of Agriculture, Statistics, Mines and Immigration. For this book, he was assisted by Henry E. Colton, geologist and mining engineer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Whig and Chronicle Steam Book and Job Printing Office
